    About Us

    Welcome To Ariflad Hotels & Suites

    With over numerous hotels worldwide, Ariflad Hotels & Suites offers a wide variety of hotels catering for a perfect stay no matter where your destination.

    The Ariflad hotel is the right choice for visitors who are searching for a combination of charm,peace and quiet and a convenient position from which to explore Venice. It’s a small, comfortable hotel situated on the NorthEast of Ogba ikeja. The Ariflad family and staffs offer an attentive,personalized service and are always available to offer any help to guests. The hotel is arranged on two floors without a lift.On the ground floor, apart from the reception there’s a comfortable lounge which you can sit to eat and drink and also have a meeting.There’s also an open bar available for guests where you can enjoy the pure atmosphere and wonderful view while you eat and drink. The rooms are arranged on the first and second floor. The hotel provides an internet points and a WiFi service. The hotel also have a moderate carpark
